page.title: 07Farming continued
page.content: easier because of machinery,especially the tractor that has taken the place of the horse. Most of the farmers prefer farming today than farming with old methods because it is easier and quicker.There is less physical work. We have one agriculural contractor in Tollerton.He works for other farmers within a 20 mile radius of Tollerton. Harvest time is the busiest time of the year for him.He uses machinery that farmers do not have such as a combine harvester,a sugar beet puller, a rotavator and a hedge cutter. There are two chicken farms in the area. One rears chicks for egg laying.The chicks are delivered when they are one day old and leave for an egg farm when they are 20 weeks old.The other farm
